title: Motivation and Cognitive Load Management Strategies in Remote Science Education

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level subject-matter expertise and problem-solving abilities
context.additional_context: Motivation enhancement and cognitive load reduction strategies using animation and interactive video materials in smartphone-based learning environments.

learning_goals: Learners can accurately explain over 80% of scientific concepts through animated videos
Learners achieve 4 or more points (out of 5) on the self-reported motivation scale (IMMS-SU) when using interactive video-based learning
Learners experience low cognitive load (3 or fewer points out of 5) on the external cognitive load measurement tool (Kalyuga et al.)

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
